quote: The past no longer is, the future is not yet here; there is only one moment in which life is available, and that is the present moment.
author: Thích Nhát Hanh

quote: The present moment is filled with joy and happiness. If you are attentive, you will see it.
author: Thích Nhát Hanh

quote: Drink your tea slowly and reverently, as if it is the axis on which the world earth revolves - slowly, evenly, without rushing toward the future
author: Thích Nhát Hanh

quote: When we are mindful, deeply in touch with the present moment, our understanding of what is going on deepens, and we begin to be filled with acceptance, joy, peace and love.
author: Thích Nhát Hanh

quote: You can't stop the waves, but you can learn to surf.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: Mindfulness is about being fully awake in our lives. It is about perceiving the exquisite vividness of each moment.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: You practice mindfulness, on the one hand, to be calm and peaceful. On the other hand, as you practice mindfulness and live a life of peace, you inspire hope for a future of peace.
author: Thích Nhát Hanh

quote: Feelings come and go like clouds in a windy sky. Conscious breathing is my anchor.
author: Thích Nhát Hanh

quote: Now is all there is.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: The mind is everything. What you think, you become.
author: Buddha

quote: Each moment is all we need, not more.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: The attempt to escape from pain, is what creates more pain.
author: Gabor Maté

quote: In the end, just three things matter: How well we have lived, how well we have loved, how well we have learned to let go.
author: Jack Kornfield

quote: Few of us ever live in the present. We are forever anticipating what is to come or remembering what has gone.
author: Louis L'Amour

quote: Attention is the rarest and purest form of generosity.
author: Simone Weil

quote: Mindfulness allows you to live deeply every moment that is given you to live.
author: Thích Nhát Hanh

quote: Awareness is like the sun. When it shines on things, they are transformed.
author: Thích Nhát Hanh

quote: If you surrender to the wind, you can ride it.
author: Toni Morrison

quote: The most fundamental aggression to ourselves, the most fundamental harm we can do to ourselves, is to remain ignorant by not having the courage and the respect to look at ourselves honestly and gently.
author: Pema Chödrön

quote: You are the sky. Everything else – it’s just the weather.
author: Pema Chödrön

quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: This is the real secret of life—to be completely engaged with what you are doing in the here and now.
author: Alan Watts

quote: No valid plans for the future can be made by those who have no capacity for living now.
author: Alan Watts

quote: The only way to live is by accepting each minute as an unrepeatable miracle.
author: Storm Jameson

quote: When you do something, you should do it with your whole body and mind; you should be concentrated on what you do.
author: Shunryu Suzuki

quote: Meditation is the ultimate mobile device; you can use it anywhere, anytime, unobtrusively.
author: Sharon Salzberg

quote: Being mindful means that we suspend judgment for a time, set aside our immediate goals for the future, and take in the present moment as it is rather than as we would like it to be.
author: J. Mark G. Williams

quote: In the beginner's mind there are many possibilities, but in the expert's there are few.
author: Shunryu Suzuki

quote: Now is the future that you promised yourself last year, last month, last week. Now is the only moment you'll ever really have. Mindfulness is about waking up to this.
author: Mark Williams

quote: This is a wonderful day. I have never seen this one before.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The moment one gives close attention to anything, even a blade of grass it becomes a mysterious, awesome, indescribably magnificent world in itself.
author: Henry Miller

quote: If your compassion does not include yourself, it is incomplete.
author: Jack Kornfield

quote: There is something wonderfully bold and liberating about saying yes to our entire imperfect and messy life.
author: Tara Brach

quote: Between stimulus and response there is a space. In that space is our power to choose our response. In our response lies our growth and our freedom.
author: Viktor E. Frankl

quote: Mindfulness is the aware, balanced acceptance of the present experience. It isn't more complicated than that. It is opening to or receiving the present moment, pleasant or unpleasant, just as it is, without either clinging to it or rejecting it.
author: Sylvia Boorstein

quote: In today's rush we all think too much, seek too much, want too much – and forget about the joy of just being.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Look past your thoughts, so you may drink the pure nectar of This Moment.
author: Rumi

quote: Do everything with a mind that lets go. Don't accept praise or gain or anything else. If you let go a little you will have a little peace; if you let go a lot you will have a lot of peace; if you let go completely you will know complete peace and freedom.
author: Ajahn Chah

quote: Mindfulness is a form of awareness and attention that enables us to peer into the truth of this moment.
author: Donald Altman

quote: Use every distraction as an object of meditation and they cease to be distractions.
author: Mingyur Rinpoche

quote: The little things? The little moments? They aren't little.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: When you begin to see that your enemy is suffering, that is the beginning of insight.
author: Thích Nhát Hanh

quote: The body benefits from movement, and the mind benefits from stillness.
author: Sakyong Mipham

quote: Mindfulness is simply being aware of what is happening right now without wishing it were different; enjoying the pleasant without holding on when it changes (which it will); being with the unpleasant without fearing it will always be this way (which it won't).
author: James Baraz

quote: The goal of meditation is not focus. It's not calm. … The goal is ultimately to get to present awareness, and then we become aware of how we treat others…
author: Nanea Reeves

quote: Compassion is very clear-eyed. It's not sentimental, it's very clear-eyed and wise and objective.
author: Vidyamala Burch

quote: We cannot be present and run our story-line at the same time.
author: Pema Chödrön

quote: A crowded mind leaves no space for a peaceful heart.
author: Christine Evangelou

quote: Almost everything will work again if you unplug it for a few minutes, including you.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: Look at other people and ask yourself if you are really seeing them or just your thoughts about them.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: If it's out of your hands, it deserves freedom from your mind too.
author: Ivan Nuru

quote: The standard way of reducing stress in our culture is to put as much energy as possible into trying to arrive at a moment that matches our preferences. This ensures that we feel some level of stress until we get there (assuming we ever will) and worse, it makes the present moment into an unacceptable place to be.
author: David Cain

quote: Everything is created twice, first in the mind and then in reality.
author: Robin S. Sharma
